t: Kraft Foods | History, Products, Facts, & Merger | Britannica Money
s: Kraft Foods, producer of iconic brands such as Oscar Mayer, Jell-O, Maxwell House, and its namesake Kraft brand, is one of the world’s largest food and beverage manufacturers. In 2015, the company merged with another food giant, H.J. Heinz, to form the Kraft Heinz Company.
